name: Snowstreams
body:
### Web UI
Create and view channels from the webi.

### Presets
A few presets are included to help get you started

### Library Intgration
View your local media library

### IPTV  
Creates a simple IPTV network

### Local Input Stream  
Stream you desktop or webcams
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
